creditline: Lent by the Minnesota Historical Society Collections
description: MHS L1997.19.30; large white building at center; falls on left half; bridge across falls; carriage with two horses on bridge; gilt frame
text: This view of St. Anthony Falls, with the Winslow House Hotel in the background, shows the east bank of the Mississippi River, with the town of St. Anthony on the right and Hennepin Island on the left.
title: St. Anthony Falls
